front.title: 2X-3KPR (Tooex)
front.gametext: Where present under 'nighttime conditions,' each of your Rebels and aliens at same planet site are power +2, and also have immunity to attrition < 3 if a Hydroponics Station is present.
front.lore: Simple maintenance and diagnostics droid. Activates alarm sensors, security lighting and power fences on remote installations. KPR servant droids built by Lerrimore Droids.

pulledBy: I've Got A Bad Feeling About
